text: Alex Chow Wing Hong (; born 18th August 1990) is a Hong Kong student leader and member of the 2014 Hong Kong protests. He has alongside Umbrella Movement leaders, Nathan Law and Joshua Wong been a key member in the organizations involvement in pro-democracy protests.| Who guides Hong Kong’s ‘Umbrella Revolution’ pro-democracy movement? | World news | The GuardianJoshua Wong, Alex Chow, and Nathan Law - PEN America| Hong Kong student fears UK visa may be denied over protest conviction | World news | The Guardian == Further reading == * Nathan Law * Joshua Wong == References == Category:1990 births Category:Hong Kong activists Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the London School of Economics
title: Alex Chow
